title: Reactions to 'Zack Snyder's Justice League'
description:
In this special preview from 'The Ringer-Verse,' Van Lathan and Charles Holmes share some of their thoughts and insights into the much-anticipated 'Zack Snyder's Justice League.'
Hosts: Van Lathan and Charles Holmes.
You can follow 'The Ringer-Verse' on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
